name: @thej@social.thej.in
note: Hacker, Maker, Blogger, Developer, Teacher, Public Interest Technologist @DataMeet & CTO @Peppo. I blog at ThejeshGN.com and this is my social microblog. Everything is Personal. Bangalore/India. +05:30, IST. He/His. Email.

content.html:
Blog: Weekly Notes 52/2022

We were supposed to be in Bangalore tomorrow, just in time for the new year. But Anju‚Äôs grandmother passed away this morning. She was 90+ years. She had a wonderful life filled with grand-kids, great grand-kids. Death was peaceful. Her image in my head is always of the person reading the newspaper in the morning.

https://thejeshgn.com/2022/12/30/weekly-notes-52-2022/

content.html:
Catching up to an #introduction:

I'm admin here on spaceup.city. By day I lead #software teams at Blue Origin in #Seattle, holding #space where I can.

I'm an amateur at #photography but hope to snap more #cities and share what makes a city livable, like #carfree streets and #PublicTransit and #trains. Until then I post pictures of #cats.

I'm a #geek about #StarTrek #reading #books #SciFi #BoardGames #physics #tea and #TimeTravel, so don't expect a consistent theme.
content.value: Catching up to an #introduction:  I'm admin here on spaceup.city. By day I lead #software teams at Blue Origin in #Seattle, holding #space where I can.I'm an amateur at #photography but hope to snap more #cities and share what makes a city livable, like #carfree streets and #PublicTransit and #trains. Until then I post pictures of #cats.I'm a #geek about #StarTrek #reading #books #SciFi #BoardGames #physics #tea and #TimeTravel, so don't expect a consistent theme.

content.html:
Twitter is dying like all of the Java monoliths and Kube clusters. It‚Äôs taking a while, but rest assured they are dying. Each day another important maintenance task is neglected. Some YAML is merged with limited review. Some service is prematurely opened up for convenience. There will be no investment in anything that doesn‚Äôt immediately put money back into the company.

Think about what this means for users.
content.value: Twitter is dying like all of the Java monoliths and Kube clusters. It‚Äôs taking a while, but rest assured they are dying. Each day another important maintenance task is neglected. Some YAML is merged with limited review. Some service is prematurely opened up for convenience. There will be no investment in anything that doesn‚Äôt immediately put money back into the company.Think about what this means for users.

content.html:
What white folks don't understand is we still have grandparents who are alive and can tell us the truth.
My Grandpa was born and raised in Mississippi and his stories fill in the gaps for real .
Real stories of oppression he and his parents had to put up with in his own country ffs!
That is what drives me , what gives me the energy to fight back and show what we can achieve.
Segregation is recent history. We can't just forget and forgive!

#BlackMastodon #BlackLivesMatter #BlackFedi
content.value: What white folks don't understand is we still have grandparents who are alive and can tell us the truth. My Grandpa was born and raised in Mississippi and his stories fill in the gaps for real .Real stories of oppression he and his parents had to put up with in his own country ffs! That is what drives me , what gives me the energy to fight back and show what we can achieve. Segregation is recent history. We can't just forget and forgive!#BlackMastodon #BlackLivesMatter #BlackFedi

content.html:
Blog: Programmatically Creating Embulk Configuration Files

Embulk needs a YAML file configuration for each data load. It‚Äôs a simple format, very human-readable. But there are cases where I want the YAML files to generate dynamically. Embulk does support an experimental feature that involves liquid templates. But my team is well versed in Python and Jinja2. Hence that is what we use.

https://thejeshgn.com/2022/12/28/programmatically-creating-embulk-configuration-files/
content.value:

content.html: Starting today, @Techmeme and @Mediagazer editors are now seeing @-mentions you make here, via Mastodon's notifications API. So if you want to tip us on a news link, or have excellent, pithy commentary, add @Techmeme to the end of your post and we may act on it. (We won't reply directly, but we'll see it!) We'll also see replies to our posts, since replies are @-mentions too!
content.value: Starting today, @Techmeme and @Mediagazer editors are now seeing @-mentions you make here, via Mastodon's notifications API. So if you want to tip us on a news link, or have excellent, pithy commentary, add @Techmeme to the end of your post and we may act on it. (We won't reply directly, but we'll see it!) We'll also see replies to our posts, since replies are @-mentions too!

content.html:
And

Reports in Russian media said Mr Antov, 65, had fallen from a window at the hotel in the city of Rayagada on Sunday. Another member of his four-strong Russian group, Vladimir Budanov, died at the hotel on Friday.

Superintendent Vivekananda Sharma of Odisha police said Mr Budanov was found to have suffered a stroke while his friend "was depressed after his death and he too died". The Russian consul in Kolkata, Alexei Idamkin, told the Tass news agency that police did not see a "criminal element in these tragic events".

https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-64101437

content.html:
The thing that is wild to me is that the vast majority of people who know me on this app are ‚Äúnew‚Äù.

Like I can totally reinvent myself. We are just going to gloss over the public speaking Kris N√≥va and the kernel hacker Kris N√≥va and the Kubernetes Kris N√≥va and the naked on the beach Kris N√≥va and just go straight into entrepreneur and technical leader version of myself and honestly I‚Äôm okay with Nova 4.0

Please to meet you all. Maybe I should do my own #Hachyderm #Introduction thread?

content.html:
DEFCON.social is now open - no more invite codes needed!

With the fix (ü§û) to the federated image cache our new 30TB Block Storage server seems to be happy.

Next up we will enable search - just deciding between Elastic Search or Open Search, so any opinions welcome.
#MastoAdmin

content.html:
Over the last few days, I experimented with moving my Twitter archive to my personal #Mastodon account @luca@social.luca.run and finally succeeded.

I had to modify the Mastodon source to allow backdated posts and prevent it from spamming other instances with old posts. Because image descriptions aren't included in the Twitter export, I had to request them from the API. There I got full text for truncated Retweets as well.

Incomplete notes:
https://github.com/lucahammer/fediporter

#TwitterMigration #MastoAdmin
content.value: Over the last few days, I experimented with moving my Twitter archive to my personal #Mastodon account @luca@social.luca.run and finally succeeded.I had to modify the Mastodon source to allow backdated posts and prevent it from spamming other instances with old posts. Because image descriptions aren't included in the Twitter export, I had to request them from the API. There I got full text for truncated Retweets as well.Incomplete notes:https://github.com/lucahammer/fediporter#TwitterMigration #MastoAdmin
